languages.text: {n}Ксенос делает паузу, чуть откидывая назад голову и пристально изучая вас взглядом.{/n} "Ты прискорбно мало отличаешься от других, менее сообразительных особей. И все же, мон-кай, все же ты не так{mf|ой|ая}, как они... ведь ты из числа их правителей, верно? "Вольный Торговец", так тебя называют? Что ж, Вольный Торговец, раз ты все же соизволил{mf||а} явиться на встречу, открой мне свой маленький секрет".

traits.locale_text: {n}Ксенос делает паузу, чуть откидывая назад голову и пристально изучая вас взглядом.{/n} "Ты прискорбно мало отличаешься от других, менее сообразительных особей. И все же, мон-кай, все же ты не так{mf|ой|ая}, как они... ведь ты из числа их правителей, верно? "Вольный Торговец", так тебя называют? Что ж, Вольный Торговец, раз ты соизволил{mf||а} на этот раз лично явиться на встречу, открой мне свой маленький секрет.

languages.text: {n}The xenos pauses and raises his chin slightly, examining you.{/n} "There is deplorably little to distinguish you from the rest of your dull-witted species. And yet, mon-keigh... and yet you are different. After all, you are from the caste of their rulers, are you not? 'Rogue Trader' — that is what they call you? Well, then, Rogue Trader, since you nevertheless deigned to come to this meeting, tell me your little secret."
languages.original_text: {n}Ксенос делает паузу, чуть откидывая назад голову и пристально изучая вас взглядом.{/n} "Ты прискорбно мало отличаешься от других, менее сообразительных особей. И все же, мон-кай, все же ты не так{mf|ой|ая}, как они... ведь ты из числа их правителей, верно? "Вольный Торговец", так тебя называют? Что ж, Вольный Торговец, раз ты все же соизволил{mf||а} явиться на встречу, открой мне свой маленький секрет".

traits.locale_text: {n}The xenos pauses and raises his chin slightly, examining you.{/n} "You look woefully indistinguishable from other, not as bright specimens. And yet, mon-keigh... and yet you are different. After all, you are from the caste of their rulers, are you not? 'Rogue Trader' — that is what they call you? Well, then, Rogue Trader, since you were so kind as to arrive to this meeting in person, tell me your little secret."

After all, you are from the caste of their rulers, are you not? 'Rogue Trader' — that is what they call you? Well, then, Rogue Trader, since you were so kind as to arrive to this meeting in person, tell me your little secret."

Well, then, Rogue Trader, since you were so kind as to come to this meeting in person, tell me your little secret."

Well, then, Rogue Trader, since you were so kind as to come to this meeting in person, tell me your little secret."

{n}The xenos pauses and raises his chin slightly, examining you.{/n} "There is deplorably little to distinguish you from the rest of your dull-witted species. And yet, mon-keigh... and yet you are different. After all, you are from the caste of their rulers, are you not? 'Rogue Trader' — that is what they call you? Well, then, Rogue Trader, since you nevertheless deigned to come to this meeting, tell me your little secret."

languages.text: {n}El xenos se detiene y levanta la barbilla levemente para examinarte.{/n} «Eres deplorablemente similar al resto de tu ignorante especie. Y, sin embargo... eres diferente, mon-keigh. A fin de cuentas, eres de la casta gobernante, ¿no? Te llaman "Comerciante Independiente", si no me equivoco. Bueno, Comerciante Independiente, puesto que te has dignado acudir a este encuentro, cuéntame tu secreto».
languages.original_text: {n}The xenos pauses and raises his chin slightly, examining you.{/n} "There is deplorably little to distinguish you from the rest of your dull-witted species. And yet, mon-keigh... and yet you are different. After all, you are from the caste of their rulers, are you not? 'Rogue Trader' — that is what they call you? Well, then, Rogue Trader, since you nevertheless deigned to come to this meeting, tell me your little secret."

traits.locale_text: {n}El xenos se detiene y levanta la barbilla levemente para examinarte.{/n} «Eres deplorablemente similar al resto de tu ignorante especie. Y, sin embargo... eres diferente, mon-keigh. A fin de cuentas, eres de la casta gobernante, ¿no? Te llaman "Comerciante Independiente", si no me equivoco. Bueno, Comerciante Independiente, puesto que te has dignado acudir a este encuentro, cuéntame tu secreto».

languages.text: {n}异形顿了顿，微微扬起下巴，审视着你。{/n}“真是令人遗憾，你和你那些智力低下的同胞们没什么区别。不过你这只猴子……确实不太一样，毕竟你属于统治者的种姓，是吧？行商浪人——他们就是这么称呼你的吧？很好，既然你决定来见我一面，那就和我说说你的小秘密吧，行商浪人。”
languages.original_text: {n}The xenos pauses and raises his chin slightly, examining you.{/n} "There is deplorably little to distinguish you from the rest of your dull-witted species. And yet, mon-keigh... and yet you are different. After all, you are from the caste of their rulers, are you not? 'Rogue Trader' — that is what they call you? Well, then, Rogue Trader, since you nevertheless deigned to come to this meeting, tell me your little secret."

traits.locale_text: {n}异形顿了顿，微微扬起下巴，审视着你。{/n}“真是令人遗憾，你和你那些智力低下的同胞们没什么区别。不过你这只猴子……确实不太一样，毕竟你属于统治者的种姓，是吧？行商浪人——他们就是这么称呼你的吧？很好，既然你决定来见我一面，那就和我说说你的小秘密吧，行商浪人。”

languages.text: {n}異種族は喋るのを止め、わずかに顎を上げてこちらをまじまじと見てきた。{/n}「いくら観察しても、お前の頭の悪い種族の者たちと同じように見える。なのに、モン＝ケイよ…なのにも関わらず、お前だけは違う。腐ってもお前は彼らの支配者の階級出身なのだろう？『自由開拓者』と呼ばれていたか？ならば、自由開拓者よ…せっかくこの場で会えたのだから、お前の秘密を教えてくれ」
languages.original_text: {n}The xenos pauses and raises his chin slightly, examining you.{/n} "There is deplorably little to distinguish you from the rest of your dull-witted species. And yet, mon-keigh... and yet you are different. After all, you are from the caste of their rulers, are you not? 'Rogue Trader' — that is what they call you? Well, then, Rogue Trader, since you nevertheless deigned to come to this meeting, tell me your little secret."

traits.locale_text: {n}異種族は喋るのを止め、わずかに顎を上げてこちらをまじまじと見てきた。{/n}「いくら観察しても、お前の頭の悪い種族の者たちと同じように見える。なのに、モン＝ケイよ…なのにも関わらず、お前だけは違う。腐ってもお前は彼らの支配者の階級出身なのだろう？"自由開拓者"と呼ばれていたかな？ならば、自由開拓者よ…せっかくこの場で会えたのだから、お前の秘密を教えてくれ」

languages.text: {n}Der Xenos macht eine Pause und mustert dich mit leicht erhobenem Kinn.{/n} "Da ist enttäuschend wenig, was Euch vom Rest Eurer beschränkten Spezies unterscheidet. Und dennoch, Chem-Pan-Sey ... und dennoch seid Ihr anders. Schließlich entstammt Ihr der Kaste ihrer Herrscher, richtig? '{mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}' – so nennen sie Euch? Nun denn, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}, da Ihr trotzdem so gnädig wart, zu diesem Treffen zu erscheinen, verratet mir Euer kleines Geheimnis."
languages.original_text: {n}The xenos pauses and raises his chin slightly, examining you.{/n} "There is deplorably little to distinguish you from the rest of your dull-witted species. And yet, mon-keigh... and yet you are different. After all, you are from the caste of their rulers, are you not? 'Rogue Trader' — that is what they call you? Well, then, Rogue Trader, since you nevertheless deigned to come to this meeting, tell me your little secret."

Und dennoch, Chem-Pan-Sey ... und dennoch seid Ihr anders. Schließlich entstammt Ihr der Kaste ihrer Herrscher, richtig? '{mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}' – so nennen sie Euch? Nun denn, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}, da Ihr trotzdem so gnädig wart, zu diesem Treffen zu erscheinen, verratet mir Euer kleines Geheimnis."

languages.original_text: {n}The xenos pauses and raises his chin slightly, examining you.{/n} "There is deplorably little to distinguish you from the rest of your dull-witted species. And yet, mon-keigh... and yet you are different. After all, you are from the caste of their rulers, are you not? 'Rogue Trader' — that is what they call you? Well, then, Rogue Trader, since you nevertheless deigned to come to this meeting, tell me your little secret."

languages.text: {n}Le xénos se tait et vous examine en levant légèrement le menton.{/n} « Je constate avec dépit que bien peu de choses vous distinguent du reste de votre espèce arriérée. Pourtant, mon-keigh... vous êtes bel et bien {mf|différent|différente}, car vous faites partie de la caste des dirigeants, n'est-ce pas ? On vous appelle {mf|un "libre-marchand"|une "libre-marchande"}, il me semble ? Eh bien, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}, puisque vous avez pris la peine de venir me rencontrer, révélez-moi donc votre secret. »
languages.original_text: {n}The xenos pauses and raises his chin slightly, examining you.{/n} "There is deplorably little to distinguish you from the rest of your dull-witted species. And yet, mon-keigh... and yet you are different. After all, you are from the caste of their rulers, are you not? 'Rogue Trader' — that is what they call you? Well, then, Rogue Trader, since you nevertheless deigned to come to this meeting, tell me your little secret."

Pourtant, mon-keigh... vous êtes bel et bien {mf|différent|différente}, car vous faites partie de la caste des dirigeants, n'est-ce pas ? On vous appelle {mf|un "libre-marchand|une "libre-marchande}", il me semble ? Eh bien, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}, puisque vous avez pris la peine de venir me rencontrer, révélez-moi donc votre secret. »

languages.text: {n}Zeno duraksıyor ve çenesini hafifçe kaldırarak seni izliyor.{/n} "Seni yarım akıllı soydaşlarından ayırt etmek hiç kolay değil. Lakin mon-keigh... Sen ayrısın. Nihayetinde onların hükümdarlarının soyundansın, değil mi? 'Hür Tacir' mi diyorlardı sana? Evet Hür Tacir, madem bu toplantıya buyur ettin, dökül bakalım sırrını."
languages.original_text: {n}The xenos pauses and raises his chin slightly, examining you.{/n} "There is deplorably little to distinguish you from the rest of your dull-witted species. And yet, mon-keigh... and yet you are different. After all, you are from the caste of their rulers, are you not? 'Rogue Trader' — that is what they call you? Well, then, Rogue Trader, since you nevertheless deigned to come to this meeting, tell me your little secret."
